title: Matrix Addition
statement:
# Matrix Addition

Add two matrices of the same dimensions.

## Problem Description

Given two N×M matrices, compute their sum.

## Input Format

First line: two integers N and M
Next N lines: M integers (first matrix)
Next N lines: M integers (second matrix)

## Output Format

N lines, each with M space-separated integers (result matrix).

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N, M ≤ 100
- -1000 ≤ elements ≤ 1000
